## Introduction

This is just a convenience function in the form of a landing page for students to quickly find links. This page is usually only updated when I update class notes. 

For more about me, check out [my about](https://mathewkiang.com/aboutme/) page, [my CV](https://mathewkiang.com/assets/mkiangcv.pdf), or go to [mathewkiang.com](https://mathewkiang.com). 

## Course materials

- **Data to Decisions: Intro to Causal Inference for Data Science**
    - Short workshop for ITAM Master's in Data Science students (March 2017)
    - [Slides](http://mkiang.github.io/intro-ci-shortcourse/)
    - [Source code](https://github.com/mkiang/intro-ci-shortcourse)
    - Created with [Zhe Zhang](http://aboutzhe.com) and [Monica Alexander](http://monicaalexander.com/)
- **EPI 501 - Dynamics of Infectious Disease**
    - At HSPH with Professor Buckee (Spring 2017)
    - [Slides](https://mkiang.github.io/epi501_review/)
    - [Source code](https://github.com/mkiang/epi501_review)

## Other
- **Using Python for Research**
    - [HarvardX](https://www.edx.org/course/using-python-research-harvardx-ph526x) link
    - I still (sometimes) frequent the forum to assist
    - We are taking suggestions for revisions on the next round of this class
- **Interactive Disease Dynamics**
    - Just a quick and dirty [shiny app](https://mkiang.shinyapps.io/DiseaseDynamics/) designed to help students understand how small changes can have large effects on dynamics
    - [Source code](https://github.com/mkiang/DiseaseDynamics)
- **ACS Exporer**
    - [Shiny app](https://mkiang.shinyapps.io/PrEligibles/) for exploring demographics of the 2013 ACS quickly
    - [Source code](https://github.com/mkiang/PrEligibles)
